entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Economy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.9°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of rain or snow beginning before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023
